name: Magpie (brossentia)
description:
What's the story? There's not one! You're a bird. Hop around and collect the stars.

Why does the bird die when hopping in the water? Why do you push boxes? Why can't you fly? I dunno! I'm no ornithologist. I just made the game.

The current release features 20 different puzzles, each focusing on the unique twist that Magpie brings to the Sokoban-like genre: moving two spaces instead of one. More levels will be added in the future as more mechanics get programmed into the game.

Get ready to hop!
